column1: Table 88. Percent of victimizations resulting in loss of time from work, by type of crime and race of victims
data source: National Criminal Victimization Survey, 2005  NCJ 215244
authors:  Patsy Klaus and Cathy Maston
Table 88. Selected personal and property crimes, 2005: Percent of victimizations resulting in loss of time from work, by type of crime and race of victims
Note: Excludes data on persons with races other than White only or Black only.
*Estimate is based on about 10 or fewer sample cases.
a/Includes data on purse snatching/pocket picking, not shown separately.
b/Includes verbal threats of rape and threats of sexual assault.
